name: Central Park Dog Playdate
description: Join fellow dog owners every Saturday at Central Park for a fun playdate!

name: PetPal Monthly Meetup
description: A monthly meetup for all pet lovers, organized by PetPal.

name: Taman Tasik Titiwangsa Walk
description: Join us for a morning walk around Taman Tasik Titiwangsa with your pets!

name: Sungai Buloh Pet Gathering
description: Meet other pet owners at Sungai Buloh for an afternoon of fun and activities for pets.

name: Kota Damansara Pet Playdate
description: Come to Kota Damansara's park for a pet playdate with lots of running space and a dog-friendly cafe nearby.

name: Shah Alam Pet Lovers Meetup
description: Gather at Shah Alam's recreational park for a day of fun activities for you and your pets!

name: Bukit Kiara Park Playdate
description: A casual meetup for pets and owners at Bukit Kiara Park every Sunday morning.

name: Subang Jaya Pet Walk
description: A monthly walk for pets and their owners around the scenic parks of Subang Jaya.
